properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 20 NOV
   BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING 5.4 MILE
   LONG CABLES VICINITY OF TRACKLINE BETWEEN
   06-48.45N 049-38.56W AND 05-31.25N 048-10.36W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2703/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 21 NOV 12.
